issue.title: Atlas falls when stepping with libAtlasSimInterface3.so.3.0.0

content.raw: Iters actually needs to be 200 for a number of step cases.  Attached is a case (robot_fall.cpp) that fails at iters 100, but works at iters 200 (as atlas.world is set to).  If you have existing worlds, you need to go through them and manually change the iters/sor for step to work.  Interestingly, rotating the robot 90 degrees (yaw = 1.514) and using a rotated step set (robot_fall_rotated.cpp) works at iters=100.
